result.eng: They spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ga: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.orig: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.html: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.

result.eng: He spent his whole life on the island.
result.ga: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.orig: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.html: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé a ẛaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: I stayed home the whole day.
result.ga: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.orig: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.html: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan mé sa ḃaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.

result.html: Seo iomlán na fírinneThis is the whole truth.
result.ponchtml: Seo iomlán na fírinneThis is the whole truth.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.html: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.

result.eng: The whole world knows who you are.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.html: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.

result.eng: This television station caters for the whole community.
result.ga: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig
result.orig: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig
result.html: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uiligThis television station caters for the whole community.
result.ponchtml: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an ṗobal uiligThis television station caters for the whole community.

result.eng: It was raining the whole time.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fad
result.html: Bhí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fadIt was raining the whole time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fadIt was raining the whole time.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ga: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.orig: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.html: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ponchtml: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.orig: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.html: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an FhraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí sé 11 bliain d'aois ḃog an teaġlaċ go léir go dtí an ḞraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
